project.name: |---- 003-lounge-html-links
project.description:
The project leverages on 001-lounge-html to create two additional pages that can be accessed from the about.html page using links. The a element is used to create a hyperlink to another web page. The content of the a element becomes a clickable in the web page and the href attribute tells the browser where to direct the user when the link is clicked on.
It also features some basic site organization: + root folder: for home page, lounge.html + about folder : for directions.html + beverages : for elixir.html + images : for all the images
lounge.html : The main page for the Head First Lounge. It includes two links (a elements) to the elixir and direction pages.
